name: expectation(forNotification:object:notificationCenter:handler:)
desc: Creates an expectation that the test fulfills when it receives a specific notification from a specific notification center for a specified object.
declaration:
func expectation(forNotification notificationName: NSNotification.Name, 
          object objectToObserve: Any?, 
notificationCenter: NotificationCenter, 
         handler: XCTNSNotificationExpectation.Handler? = nil) -> XCTestExpectation
